description: System-generated unique identifier of this contact attribute definition record; used as the primary key and for joins.
Human-readable label shown in the UI for this attribute (e.g., field caption).
Longer explanation of the attribute’s purpose and how it should be used.
Code indicating the attribute’s data type (e.g., text, number, time); value set is system-defined; confirm with SME.
Maximum length, precision, or scale permitted for values of this attribute, depending on the data type.
Flag indicating whether this attribute must be provided on a contact (1 = required, 0 = optional).
Reference or code for additional validation/formatting rules applied to this attribute; likely links to a specification table; confirm with SME.
Unit associated with numeric/time values for this attribute (e.g., hours, minutes); blank if not applicable.
Value automatically populated for this attribute when creating a contact, if no value is provided.
Numeric position controlling this attribute’s ordering in lists or forms.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this attribute definition.
Free-form notes or admin comments about the attribute.
Timestamp of the last modification performed by a user to this record; may duplicate system last_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this attribute definition.
Timestamp when the attribute definition was created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last modified this attribute definition.
Timestamp when the attribute definition was last modified by a user.
